subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Competing with a brace on his ankle, Brad Keselowski sped off on the final restart late in the race in Long Pond, Pa., to pick up his second victory of the season.
snippet: Competing with a brace on his ankle, Brad Keselowski sped off on the final restart late in the race in Long Pond, Pa., to pick up his second victory of the season.
